attributes.action: Stop illegal immigration and false refugee status
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to make it an offence for any person to enter the UK without going through Immigration and Customs and then to immediately deport that person with no rights to appeal, human rights or otherwise. Get really tough on people presenting as refugees  eg. surely a person presenting from Africa who arrives on a ferry from Europe has hardly sort sanctuary in the nearest safe haven if they are true refugee.Gov also needs to be tougher on those already here and investigate the reality of their country of origin and their position in it. possible use lie dectors on them.
